QuestData.Title: Shadowhide Extinction
QuestData.Description: Now that every Blackrock orc south of Lake Everstill is nothing more than ash and cinder, we can turn our attention to the Shadowhide gnoll army of Galardell Valley, directly north of here.$B$BI want you to head out there and kill 'em all, $n! Initiate Operation: Extinction, soldier. For Bravo Company and for the Alliance!
QuestData.RewardText: <Danforth's voice comes in over the Bravo Company field kit.>$B$BHello? Is this thing on?$B$B<You hear Keeshan's voice in the background, and some muffled scrapes as they adjust the signal.>$B$BThere we go. Good work, $n. We're closing in on the Blackrock high command. There's nowhere left for those dogs to run.
